major_factions.name: The Dying Church
major_factions.description: The dominant religious institution that doth enforce the sacred Ordinance of Devotion with zealous fervor
major_factions.leader: Arch-Priestess Josilfa Migol, She Who Speaketh for the Silent God
major_factions.attitude: Fanatically devoted to their crumbling faith
activities: Elaborate sacrifice ceremonies to appease silent gods

major_factions.name: House of Broken Nobles
major_factions.description: Fallen aristocracy clinging desperately to the tattered remnants of their former power and privilege
major_factions.leader: Various disgraced nobles of once-proud lineages
major_factions.headquarters: The Rotting Mansion, monument to past glories
activities: Hoarding what wealth remaineth to them

major_factions.name: Merchants of Misery
major_factions.description: A guild most profane that doth control all trade in forbidden goods and human suffering
major_factions.leader: Koopman Achim Igelfreund, Master of the Dark Commerce
major_factions.headquarters: The Corpse Warehouse, where flesh becomes coin
activities: Trade most forbidden in cursed wares
Soul brokering to the highest bidder
Commerce in corpses both fresh and ancient
Black market dealings that shame the light

major_factions.name: The Bone Throne
major_factions.description: Secretive order of necromancers and death cultists

major_factions.name: Plague Wardens
major_factions.description: Organization dedicated to managing and exploiting disease

major_factions.name: Shadow Parliament
major_factions.description: Secretive council of powerful individuals manipulating city politics

local_factions.name: Basilisk Knights Order
local_factions.description: Elite warriors dedicated to hunting heretics and protecting the church

local_factions.name: Worm Sorcerer's Disciples
local_factions.description: Cult following the teachings of the mysterious Worm Sorcerer

local_factions.name: Dunglander Collective
local_factions.description: Group specializing in harvesting and cultivating mushrooms

local_factions.name: The Vultures
local_factions.description: Scavengers who collect spoils from the city's waste and corpses

local_factions.name: Mushroom Farmers Guild
local_factions.description: Professional organization controlling mushroom cultivation and trade

local_factions.name: Flutter Breeders
local_factions.description: Specialists in breeding and training the dangerous Flutter creatures

criminal_factions.name: Grave Robber Crews
criminal_factions.description: Organized groups that raid tombs and collect valuable corpses

criminal_factions.name: Mercenary Companies
criminal_factions.description: Professional fighters for hire, often working for the highest bidder

criminal_factions.name: Cultist Cells
criminal_factions.description: Secretive groups worshipping forbidden entities and practicing dark magic

criminal_factions.name: Death Merchant Cartels
criminal_factions.description: Organizations specializing in the trade of death-related goods and services

faction_relationships.description: The church provides authority and the knights provide enforcement
The church actively hunts and destroys cultist groups
Both groups compete for control of death-related commerce
The parliament manipulates the nobles for political gain
Both groups work together in corpse collection and processing
